summary: An ordinance relating to the condemnation for Armory Way under Ordinance No. 66339, as amended; providing for the acceptance of the awards in said condemnation proceeding; creating a special fund to be designated "Armory Way Condemnation Award Fund" to pay said awards; and appropriating moneys from the City Street Fund as of October 1, 1940 to pay the warrants drawn on said Condemnation Fund.
